src:
Daihatsu Sindir Xpander Crossover: Penjualan Mulai Turun
07 Nov 2019, 19:50 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi Xpander Mitsubishi. (CNN Indonesia/Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Mitsubishi Xpander Crossover baru akan diluncurkan pada 12 November 2019. Astra Daihatsu Motor (ADM) yang punya produk mobil pesaingnya merespons bahwa kehadiran Xpander Crossover adalah sikap sadar Mitsubishi Indonesia melihat data penjualan Xpander turun.Motors Krama Yudha Sales Indonesia (MMKSI) disebut butuh produk 'penyegar' untuk mendongkrak pasar low MPV tujuh penumpang itu."Xpander Crossover bagus. Itu strategi sebuah brand, bukan hanya Mitsubishi untuk mengexpand dia punya penjualan. Karena kalau liat dari teori, abis naik kan dia (penjualan Mitsubishi Xpander) turun," kata Direktur Marketing Astra Daihatsu Motor (ADM) Amelia Tjandra di Jakarta, Kamis (7/11).Xpander yang diluncurkan pada Agustus 2017 penjualannya langsung meledak. Bahkan baru beberapa bulan dipasarkan, penjualan Xpander sempat menyalip penjualan wholesales per bulan Toyota Avanza.Selama 2018 Xpander juga memberi perlawanan sengit terhadap Avanza, meski pada hasil akhirnya di penghujung 2018 tetap berada di posisi kedua sebagai low MPV terlaris. Penjualan Xpander tahun lalu 75.075 unit, sementara Avanza 82.167 unit. Sedangkan Daihatsu Xenia penjualan hanya berjumlah 29.521 unit.Sementara itu memasuki semester kedua 2019, jarak Xpander dan Avanza makin jauh dari sisi penjualan setiap bulannya. Misalnya pada Agustus penjualan Avanza 8.017 unit dan Xpander 5.361 unit. Kemudian September Avanza 9.476 unit, sementara Xpander di posisi dua dengan 4.407 unit."Kalau mau naik lagi harus keluarkan varian baru itu strategi normal yang dilakukan semua pemain," ucap Amelia.Mitsubishi telah membocorkan tampilan Xpander Crossover dalam bentuk foto siluet. Dari foto tersebut dapat terlihat ada penambahan aksesori misalnya roof rail dan over fender untuk menambah tegas kesan SUV.Hingga kini belum ada keterangan teknis lain soal mobil itu. Tapi kabarnya tetap mempertahankan mesin MIVEC kapasitas 1.500 cc empat silinder dengan penggerak roda depan. Sementara ground clearance naik 20 milimeter dari yang dijual saat ini.Amelia tidak perlu khawatir andalan baru Mitsubishi itu bisa memukul Xenia. Sebab menurutnya Mitsubishi berdasarkan survei internal ADM bukan kompetitor Daihatsu. "Konsumen kami itu berbeda. Jadi biasa saja itu (Xpander Crossover). Itu juga kan yang dilakukan Honda (Mobilio-BR-V). Ya biasa saja," tutup Amelia.(ryh/DAL)
text:
Daihatsu Sindir Xpander Crossover: Sales Start to Decline
Nov 7 2019, 19:50 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration of Mitsubishi Xpander. (CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The new Mitsubishi Xpander Crossover will be launched on November 12, 2019. Astra Daihatsu Motor (ADM), which has a competing car product, responds that the presence of Xpander Crossover is a conscious attitude Mitsubishi Indonesia saw Xpander sales data go down. Motama Krama Yudha Sales Indonesia ( MMKSI) is said to need a 'refresher' product to boost the low MPV market for seven passengers. "Xpander Crossover is good. That's the strategy of a brand, not just Mitsubishi to expand it to have sales. Because if you look at the theory, then you can increase it (Mitsubishi Xpander sales) ) down, "said Marketing Director of Astra Daihatsu Motor (ADM) Amelia Tjandra in Jakarta, Thursday (7/11). XPander, which was launched in August 2017, immediately exploded sales. Even just a few months marketed, Xpander sales could overtake Toyota Avanza monthly wholesales sales. During 2018 Xpander also gave fierce resistance to Avanza, even though the end result at the end of 2018 remained in second position as the best-selling low MPV. Xpander sales last year were 75,075 units, while Avanza was 82,167 units. Whereas Daihatsu Xenia's sales only amounted to 29,521 units. Meanwhile, entering the second semester of 2019, the distance between Xpander and Avanza is getting further from the sales side each month. For example in August, sales of Avanza 8017 units and Xpander 5,361 units. Then September Avanza 9,476 units, while Xpander is in second position with 4,407 units. "If you want to go up again, you have to remove the new variant, it's the normal strategy for all players," Amelia said. Mitsubishi has leaked the look of the Xpander Crossover in the form of silhouette photos. From the photo it can be seen that there are additional accessories such as roof rails and over fenders to add firmly to the impression of the SUV. Until now there is no other technical information about the car. But reportedly still maintains a capacity of 1,500 cc four-cylinder MIVEC engine with front wheel drive. While ground clearance rose 20 millimeters from those sold today. Amelia doesn't need to worry that Mitsubishi's new mainstay could hit the Xenia. Because according to him Mitsubishi based on ADM internal survey is not a Daihatsu competitor. "Our customers are different. So it's normal (Xpander Crossover). That's also what Honda (Mobilio-BR-V) does. Yes, it's normal," Amelia concluded. (Ryh / DAL)
